text: Pietro Gallinari, also known as Pierino del Signor Guido, (1600s–1640) was an Italian painter of the Baroque period. He was a close follower of Guido Reni in Bologna. he painted for the churches and court of Guastalla. He died young, perhaps of poisoning. ==References== Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Bolognese painters Category:Italian Baroque painters Category:1640 deaths Category:Year of birth unknown
